translations: 残忍贪婪的女人；传说中鹰身女妖（harpy 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Harpies are notoriously bad at taking that kind of joke.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，女魔头们接受不了这样的玩笑。

sentences.sentence: Cairne Bloodhoof: the harpies have enslaved the wyverns!
sentences.translation: 凯恩·血蹄：这些鸟身女妖奴役了那些双足飞龙！

sentences.sentence: Thrall: Those harpies have nearly killed that wretched creature!
sentences.translation: 萨尔：那些鸟身女巫就要杀掉那头可怜的巨兽了！
